system.description: Effect: The user and all allied creatures with the Ability Plus or Minus increase their ATK stage and SPATK stage by +1 for 5 activations. The stage increase is doubled for creatures with both abilities.

actions.name: Gear Up
actions.description: Effect: The user and all allied creatures with the Ability Plus or Minus increase their ATK stage and SPATK stage by +1 for 5 activations. The stage increase is doubled for creatures with both abilities.
